item.title: Improved Loudness Correction With EBU R128
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Niels Linneberg Music mastered at different levels can be a pain when you’re a dj, as well as when listening to music at home. The great differences in loudness levels is in part due to what is sometimes called the “Loudness War”, but sometimes it is just inconsistent between different issuers. As long as you listen to a CD/compilation as it was designed from the issuer, there is no problem, it is when you start mixing tracks from different sources that the volume starts jumping up and down…
